channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sam Altman Says the GPT-5 Haters Got It All Wrong
item.description: OpenAI's CEO explains that its large language model has been misunderstood—and that he's changed his attitude to AGI.

item.title: Google’s Gemini AI app could soon be getting a big makeover
item.description: The company is seemingly experimenting with a new user interface that would shift the app from having a chatbot-style look and feel to one offering a ...

item.title: The Lenovo Go S Is $120 Off
item.description: The upgraded version of the Legion Go S with SteamOS makes for a nice Steam Deck upgrade.

item.title: Bad Bunny Has MAGA All Worked Up
item.description: After avoiding the continental US on his world tour due to ICE, Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl halftime show will be a battleground for the country’s culture ...

item.title: Your Delivery Robot Is Here
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we introduce you to DoorDash’s new delivery robot and discuss what the growing robot population means for humans.

item.title: Rivian is redesigning the R2 SUV’s door handles for better safety
item.description: The change comes after employees and customers reportedly voiced concerns.

item.title: China Is Leading the World in the Clean Energy Transition. Here's What That Looks Like
item.description: The country spends like no one else on renewables and has reshaped the global market. Is it enough?

item.title: Snapchat is going to charge for storage — here’s how to save your Memories for free
item.description: If your Memories exceed the new limit, you will need to either export them or sign up for one of Snapchat's new Memories Storage plans in order to pre...

item.title: Can you think like a YC partner? This game will help you find out
item.description: The YC Partner Simulator game, created by an undergrad in Berlin, lets you see if you can predict which startups get into Y Combinator.

item.title: What to expect at OpenAI’s DevDay 2025, and how to watch it
item.description: OpenAI's third developer conference is around the corner, and it's shaping up to be the company's biggest yet.
